name: [ACCESS KEY] - 2021 - Wave 1 Animations Pack
description:
WARNING: Make sure you have an itch.io account before buying this. Once you buy this bundle you'll have access to all future animations for FREE in 2021 Animations WAVE 1. => Products will be 100% off price for you in this category.

This way you can have more animations for a reduced price ( more than 60% off  ! ) and show support !

More than 15 animations mini packs planned for this wave ( Estimated Total Animations: 40+ ) !

=> Essentially MZ animations, but ported to MV & VX Ace when possible.

The file you download is empty, it's only there to allow the purchase.
